meanings.definition: Tending to flip or turn over quickly
meanings.sent1: The flippy pancake landed on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The cat's tail was flippy as it chased the laser pointer.
meanings.sent3: The flippy squirrel kept doing somersaults in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her flippy hair danced in the wind as she ran.
meanings.sent5: The flippy paper airplane soared through the air.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that flips or turns over quickly
meanings.sent1: The acrobat was a real flippy during the circus show.
meanings.sent2: The dolphin was a graceful flippy in the water.
meanings.sent3: The flippy coin landed on heads every time.
meanings.sent4: The gymnast was a flippy, spinning marvel on the mat.
meanings.sent5: The flippy bird darted through the trees with ease.

meanings.definition: To flip or turn over quickly
meanings.sent1: She tried to flippy the pancake but it landed on the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast can flippy in the air with perfect form.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally flippy the switch and turned off the lights.
meanings.sent4: The wind can flippy the leaves off the trees in autumn.
